dict.acceptation: 镜子，反光镜；真实的写照；反映，借鉴；榜样；

sent.orig: Bronze Mirror, Gray Mirror, Blue Mirror, Green miror, Golden Mirror.
sent.trans: 含有金，茶，灰，绿，蓝，粉，黑等颜色的镜子。

sent.orig: Besides the mirror itself is the mirror, the rest things are mere things lightened by mirror.
sent.trans: 除了镜子本生是镜子外，其余的事物便是被镜子所照亮的物体而已。

sent.orig: Electrically heated mirror or fog-free mirror, fogless mirror.
sent.trans: 电加热镜子又称除雾镜、防雾镜。

sent.orig: Milk mirror in mirror together, such as blinking stars is of the Han dynasty mirror Jiapin.
sent.trans: 乳镜聚于镜面，如繁星闪烁，是汉代铜镜中的佳品。

sent.orig: Sheet glass mirror, float glass mirror, silvered mirror and car mirrors.
sent.trans: 平板铝镜、浮法铝镜、镀银镜、汽车倒视镜。
